A person's strengths are often their biggest weaknesses.
And so that also means that their weaknesses can be their strengths.
In all those ways that I listed, I am weak.
I don't accept that I am what I am and that that is what I'm doomed to be.
And I'm kicking and clawing at those weaknesses to change them.
But each and every day I get back up and I move forward.
With my fists clenched toward the battle, toward the struggle.
And I fight with everything I've got to overcome those weaknesses and those short falls and those fall.
As I strive to be just a little bit better today.
